# targetTextScaling

**Type Property**

The text scaling mode to use after reading the text from disk.

## Declaration

```swift
static let targetTextScaling: NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is one of the options of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/NSTextScalingType] type. Some platforms scale fonts to improve their appearance. Include this option to specify the text-scaling mode you want to use for the document you read.

## Getting the font-scaling options

- **sourceTextScaling**: The text-scaling mode to associate with the document’s content.
